mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_role = "MENTEE"
SELECT d.department_seq FROM department d INNER JOIN employee e ON d.department_seq = e.department_seq WHERE e.employee_seq = #{currentEmployeeSeq};

SELECT DISTINCT d.department_seq, d.department_name FROM department d LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE ( #{empRole} = 'hr' OR ( #{empRole} = 'mentor' AND e.department_seq = #{empDepartmentSeq} ) )

SELECT e.employee_seq, e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.department_seq = #{departmentSeq} AND e.employee_role = 'MENTEE' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM mentoring AS m WHERE m.mentee_seq = e.employee_seq AND m.mentoring_active_status = 1 );

SELECT e.employee_seq, e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.department_seq = #{departmentSeq} AND e.employee_role = 'MENTEE'
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.employee_role = "MENTOR"

SELECT e.employee_name AS employeeName, e.employee_num AS employeeNum, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, e.employee_phone AS employeePhone, e.employee_email AS employeeEmail, f.file_url AS fileUrl FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN positions AS p ON e.position_seq = p.position_seq LEFT JOIN file AS f ON e.employee_seq = f.employee_seq WHERE e.employee_seq = #{employeeSeq}

SELECT mentor.employee_name AS employeeName, mentor.employee_num AS employeeNum, mentor.employee_role AS employeeRole, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, mentor.employee_phone AS employeePhone, mentor.employee_email AS employeeEmail, f.file_url AS fileUrl FROM employee AS mentee JOIN mentoring AS m ON mentee.employee_seq = m.mentee_seq JOIN employee AS mentor ON m.mentor_seq = mentor.employee_seq JOIN department AS d ON mentor.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN positions AS p ON mentor.position_seq = p.position_seq LEFT JOIN file AS f ON mentor.employee_seq = f.employee_seq WHERE mentee.employee_seq = #{employeeSeq}

SELECT mentee.employee_seq AS employeeSeq, mentee.employee_name AS employeeName, mentee.employee_role AS employeeRole, mentee.employee_num AS employeeNum, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, mentee.employee_phone AS employeePhone, mentee.employee_email AS employeeEmail, f.file_url AS fileUrl FROM employee AS mentor JOIN mentoring AS m ON mentor.employee_seq = m.mentor_seq JOIN employee AS mentee ON m.mentee_seq = mentee.employee_seq JOIN department AS d ON mentee.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN positions AS p ON mentee.position_seq = p.position_seq LEFT JOIN file AS f ON mentee.employee_seq = f.employee_seq WHERE mentor.employee_seq = #{employeeSeq} AND m.mentoring_active_status = true

SELECT e.employee_seq AS employeeSeq, e.employee_num AS employeeNum, e.employee_name AS employeeName, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, e.employee_phone AS employeePhone, e.employee_email AS employeeEmail, e.employee_role AS employeeRole FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN positions AS p ON e.position_seq = p.position_seq WHERE e.employee_deleted_status = false

SELECT e.employee_seq AS employeeSeq, e.employee_num AS employeeNum, e.employee_name AS employeeName, d.department_name AS departmentName, p.position_name AS positionName, e.employee_phone AS employeePhone, e.employee_email AS employeeEmail, e.employee_role AS employeeRole FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq JOIN positions AS p ON e.position_seq = p.position_seq WHERE e.employee_deleted_status = false AND
e.employee_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
e.employee_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
1 = 0
SELECT employee_name AS employeeName FROM employee WHERE employee_seq = #{employeeSeq}

SELECT e.employee_seq, e.employee_name, e.employee_num, d.department_name FROM employee AS e JOIN department AS d ON e.department_seq = d.department_seq WHERE e.department_seq = #{departmentSeq} AND e.employee_role = 'MENTOR' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM mentoring AS m WHERE m.mentor_seq = e.employee_seq AND m.mentoring_active_status = 1 );
SELECT e.employee_role FROM employee e WHERE employee_seq = #{employeeSeq}
